API Reference

class theband.models.Band(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Model representing a music band.

band_name

The name of the band.

Type:

str

number_of_members

The number of members in the band.

Type:

int

year_formed

The year when the band was formed.

Type:

date

genre

The genre of music the band plays.

Type:

str

about_the_band

A detailed description of the band (optional).

Type:

str, optional

__str__()[source]

Returns the band name when the object is represented as a string.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
theband.views.home(request)[source]

View function to render the home page of the band app.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered ‘homeband.html’ template.

Return type:

HttpResponse

theband.views.band_list(request)[source]

View function to list all the bands.

Only accessible to logged-in users. Displays a list of all the bands from the database.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

Returns:

The rendered ‘bandlist.html’ template with the list of bands.

Return type:

HttpResponse

theband.views.band_detail(request, pk)[source]

View function to display the details of a specific band.

Parameters:

  • request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request object.

  • pk (int) – The primary key of the band to retrieve.

Returns:

The rendered ‘bandDetail.html’ template with the band details.

Return type:

HttpResponse
